channel.title: Japan on madewhere
channel.description: Recent content in Japan on madewhere

item.title: Zero Japan
item.description: Zero Japan is a Japanese ceramics manufacturer, probably best known for the “Bee House” pour-over coffee dripper. They produce a range of ceramic goods including butter dishes, storage canisters, and salt boxes.

item.title: Seki Edge
item.description: Tweezers, shears, nail clippers, and other personal care products. In the United States, Seki Edge is distributed by Jatai.

item.title: MoonStar
item.description: MoonStar offers a wide variety of shoes, which are made in Japan.

item.title: Shoes Like Pottery
item.description: Shoes Like Pottery makes casual low and high top sneakers. As with all MoonStar sneakers, they are made in Japan.

item.title: Zojirushi
item.description: Zojirushi is probably best known for their rice cookers, but they make a considerable line of small appliances including water boilers and bread makers, a number of which are made in Japan. They also make a line of vacuum mugs and containers, but their country of origin varies.
